articles.author: Press Trust of India
articles.title: Pakistan Board's Incoming Chairman Rejects Asia Cup 'Hybrid Model' - NDTV Sports
articles.description: The likely new chairman of PCB Zaka Ashraf has rejected his predecessor Najam Sethi's much-publicised "hybrid model" for the upcoming Asia Cup
articles.content: The likely new chairman of Pakistan Cricket Board (PCB) Zaka Ashraf has rejected his predecessor Najam Sethi's much-publicised "hybrid model" for the upcoming Asia Cup, which is slated to be held in … [+3621 chars]
